properties.whats_proposed: Add cocktail lounge as a conditional use
properties.what_that_means: Would restore rights removed in 2022, allowing bar use on site
properties.staff_says: Deny – no change since Council’s 2022 decision
properties.neighbors_say: Urban Renewal Board split; owner claims unfair treatment vs. nearby city-owned lots
properties.tension: Conflict between property rights and Council’s recent policy

properties.what_that_means: Would allow limited office and mixed-use on 0.72 acres
properties.staff_says: Approve – good buffer between homes and commercial uses
properties.tension: Balancing school, warehouses, and neighborhood homes nearby

properties.what_that_means: Applicant asked to push hearing back to Oct 28, 2025
properties.neighbors_say: Pending coordination with Austin Fire Department
properties.tension: Delay rather than substantive debate yet

properties.whats_proposed: Change from Civic to Mixed Use; rezone from SF-3-NP to CS-MU-CO-NP
properties.tension: Repurposing nonprofit land for broader development

properties.whats_proposed: Add to Plaza Saltillo TOD plan
properties.what_that_means: Rezone to TOD-NP allowing taller mixed-use up to 90 feet
properties.tension: Density and height changes near rail lines

properties.whats_proposed: Add to Plaza Saltillo TOD plan
properties.what_that_means: Rezone to TOD-NP allowing taller mixed-use up to 90 feet
properties.tension: Density and height changes near rail lines

properties.what_that_means: From 4 units/10 bedrooms → up to 12 units/36 bedrooms
properties.staff_says: Approve with overlay limiting to 6 units
properties.neighbors_say: Hancock NA voted 18–6 against; worry about traffic and scale
properties.tension: Owner wants bigger units near UT; neighbors fear overbuilding
